ARABIC: إِنَّهُمْ لَن يُغْنُوا۟ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will not help you in any way against Allah. The wrongdoers are protectors of one another but Allah is the Protector of those who have taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will not avail you in the least against God. Surely the wicked are each other's friends, but God befriends those who fear and follow the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely they will be of no avail to you against Allah. Indeed the wrong-doers are friends of each other, whereas Allah is the friend of the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will never be sufficient (protection) for you in place of God. The unjust are each other's friends, but God is the guardian of the pious ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed they cannot benefit you at all against Allah; and indeed the unjust are the friends of each other; and Allah is the Friend of the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, they can avail you nothing against Allah. Verily, the wrongdoers are protecting friends of one another, but Allah is the Protector of those who have Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they shall not avail you in the least against Allah; and surely the unjust are friends of each other, and Allah is the guardian of those who guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely they will not avail thee aught against God. Surely the evildoers are friends one of the other; God is the friend of the godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! they can avail thee naught against Allah. And lo! as for the wrong-doers, some of them are friends of others; and Allah is the Friend of those who ward off (evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They can be of no avail to you against God. The wrongdoers are friends of one another, while the friend of the righteous is God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily they cannot avail thee at all against Allah. And verily the wrong doers! friends are they one Unto another. And Allah is the Friend of the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they will not avail you in any way against Allah. Indeed the wrongdoers are allies of one another, but Allah is the ally of the Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will be of no use to thee in the sight of Allah: it is only Wrong-doers (that stand as) protectors, one to another: but Allah is the Protector of the Righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, they can avail you nothing against Allah (if He wants to punish you). Verily, the Zalimun (polytheists, wrong-doers, etc.) are Auliya' (protectors, helpers, etc.) to one another, but Allah is the Wali (Helper, Protector, etc.) of the Muttaqun (pious - see V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, they will not help you at all against Allah. The harmdoers are guides of each other; but Allah is the Guide of the cautious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will not help you against God in any way. The wrongdoers are allies of one another, while God is the Protector of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:19] Assuredly they will not avail, they [will not] protect, you in any way against God, against His chastisement. And assuredly the wrongdoers, the disbelievers, are allies of one another; but God is the ally [only] of the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! they can avail you naught against Allah) against Allah's punishment if you follow their whims. (And lo! as for the wrong-doers) the disbelievers, (some of them are friends of others) some of them follow the religion of others; (and Allah is the Friend of those who ward off (evil)) disbelief, idolatry and indecencies.
